LanguageData.MeatEating_Disapproved.label: осуджується
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.label: жахливо
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.description: Їсти м'ясо будь-якого виду - це жахливо.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.label: vegetarian abhorrent
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.description: Anyone who is a vegetarian is deeply morally deficient. Every meal should have some meat. Eggs, milk, and processed foods without vegetables are also fine.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.label: vegetarian disliked
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.descripti: Eating vegetarian food is distasteful. Every meal should have some meat. Eggs, milk, and processed foods without vegetables are also fine.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Horrible.label: vegetarian hated
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Horrible.description: Eating vegetarian food is awful. Every meal should have some meat. Eggs, milk, and processed foods without vegetables are also fine.
